description: A cunning, if somewhat scatterbrained member of the Outlaws crew, Sesha has spent most of her adult life being experimented on, which gave her accelerated cell regeneration. Sesha is known for her emotional intelligence, outside-the-box thinking, and a disarming personality. However, some say that her personality is a ruse, hiding a more conniving and manipulative mind underneath...

captain_maneuver.name: Always on Guard
captain_maneuver.bonus: If the opponent is an Eclipse hostile (including Armada Targets), Sesha has a {value} chance to reduce the opponent's Critical Hit Chance by 15%

officer_ability.name: Intimidation
officer_ability.bonus: For the first three rounds of combat, when fighting Eclipse hostiles (including Armada Targets), Sesha increases the Critical Damage Bonus of the ship by {value}.
